publicationStmt.authority: Casting Digital Nets: Fishery Modeling, Native Dispossession, and Dynamic History on the Great Plains

address.addrLine: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

div1.p: H. Hardman and wife, John Picotte and wife, Herbert and Paul Picotte, M. N. Vandall Vandal, Ed, Lawrence and Ben Vandal went down to Wagner Tuesday to attend the funeral of Mr. Bonnin, father of Henry and Alfred Bonnin. Mr. Bonnin was one of the early settlers in this county and is known to many of the old timers. For the last few years he has been making his home with his son, Sam, of Oklahoma, where he was at the time of his death. The funeral was in charge of the Masons at Wagner and interment was made in the Greenwood cemetery.
